Title: Clarifies that making a referral of alleged improper conduct of a police officer to district attorney within 48 hours of conduct is not an improper employer practice
Summary: Provides that it shall not be an improper practice for a public employer to immediately refer to the appropriate district attorney any issue regarding the alleged improper conduct of a police officer within forty-eight hours of such conduct.
LawCode: Add ยง209-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to improper employer practices regarding conduct of police officers
